column4: my firefox 3.5 takes a long time to startup, anyone else experiencing this?  i have disabled all my addons and still having the same problem.
Thats fx/gecko for ya. Have you considered switching to chromium or epiphany/webkit?
i can't live without fast dial and delicious addon for FF - but i will use chromium if i have to.
fair enough. I really miss firebug & flashblock in chromium
